entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local blowing snow late this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 9:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
